title: Senator Tarar, Thai ambassador explore cooperation in key sectors
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Federal Minister for Law and Justice Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar met with Thai Ambassador Rongvudhi Virabutr on Thursday and discussed women’s empowerment, tourism, human rights, and cooperation in the legal sector.
Federal Minister acknowledged the role of the Thai government in empowering women in Pakistan through skill-based training programs.
Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar remarked that the role of women in Pakistan was emerging and more and more women were actively participating in various fields.
The discussion also focused on tourism and the preservation of cultural heritage.
Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar praised Thailand’s achievements in the tourism sector.
Both sides expressed willingness to enhance cooperation in several areas, particularly in the promotion of human rights and the preservation of cultural assets.
